translation.en: Fuck yes.
♪ We want it all ♪
You need a towel, miss.
I need a drink, Brian, but I'd settle for a towel, thank you.
translation.ko: 술이 더 좋긴 한데 일단 수건으로 만족하죠

translation.en: That closet is magic.
Oh, it's just the basics really, miss.
When the apocalypse comes, I hope I'm with you.
-It would be my pleasure. -[woman chuckles]
Glad to hear luck went your way in the Butler trial.
-What do you mean "luck"? -[Brian chuckles]
I don't know how you do it, miss.
[woman] Anything decent come in?
There is something in your pigeonhole. Next-level stuff, I'd say.
translation.ko: 우편함에 넣어 놨어요 엄청난 사건 같던데요?

translation.en: Intriguing. I'll take a look.
Shall I wait?
No. You should go.
Are you sure there's nothing I can do?
Yes, there is, Brian.
Have a glorious weekend.
There you go, madam.
-[waitress] Champagne? -Thank you.
-[woman] Hi, Sophie. -Hello, darling. Hi.
-[woman 2] Mrs Whitehouse. How are you? -Oh hello.
-What could be bad on this beautiful day? -[woman 2 chuckles]
translation.ko: 오늘 같은 날 나쁠 이유가 없죠

translation.en: [woman 3] Hello.
-[woman 4] There she is. -Hello, hello.
-Where's your handsome half? -That is a very good question.
translation.ko: - 훤칠한 남편은 어디 갔어? - 나도 궁금하네

translation.en: He promised he would leave the constituency on time for once, but…
translation.ko: 오늘은 꼭 선거구에서 일찍 오겠다고 했는데 말이지

translation.en: -How's the birthday boy? -In denial.
translation.ko: - 생일 주인공은 어때? - 애써 부정하는 중

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[woman 5] Enjoy your night.
-[Sophie] Hello. -I don't like the number 44.
Oh, but 44 is the luckiest number in ancient Egypt.
-Highly associated with wealth and wisdom. -Is that true?
No. I just made it up. [chuckles]
-Cheeky Sophie. -[man 2] Happy birthday.
You have half your whole life ahead of you.
We are lucky.
-Where's James? -Let me find out.
-Happy birthday, Mark. -Excuse me. Sorry.
-[Ellie] Lucy. -[Lucy] Ellie, darling.
-[Lucy] Hello. -You've reached James Whitehouse.
Please leave your name and number. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.ko: 성함과 번호를 남겨주시면 최대한 빨리 연락드리겠습니다

translation.en: My darling man, where the fuck are you?
[woman] I counted.
I stood on the kerb, and I counted.
And the little green man flashed for a mere five seconds.
-Well, that's not enough time, is it? -No, it's not, Minister.
I mean, I think they decided that pedestrian crossings
only needed a second per metre.
Now, I know that you do have more important things to consider,
but show me an old bird who could manage that.
translation.ko: 늙은이의 불만을 해소해 줄 사람 좀 알려줘요

translation.en: First of all, show me an old bird, Mrs Murray.
And I take the safety of my constituents personally.
What I want for my family is what I want for Mrs Sibyl Murray of Thurlsdon.
translation.ko: 제 가족과 머레이 부인의 안전이 똑같이 중요하죠

translation.en: We'll write a letter.
-Right away. -Thank you very much indeed.
-[James] Got everything? Okay. -[woman] Yes, sir.
[James] Straight home, please.
-[driver] Sure. -Thank you.
-Would you go back? -[Sophie] To Corsica?
In a heartbeat.
It was the most relaxing holiday of my life.
translation.ko: 평생 휴가지에서 이렇게 편한 적이 없었다니까

translation.en: James taught the kids how to sail,
translation.ko: 애들은 제임스랑 세일링하고 난 해변에 앉아서

translation.en: and I sat on the beach and remembered that I knew how to read.
translation.ko: 애들은 제임스랑 세일링하고 난 해변에 앉아서 오랜만에 소설을 읽었거든 4권이나, 천국이 따로 없더라

translation.en: -Four novels. Heaven. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.ko: 오랜만에 소설을 읽었거든 4권이나, 천국이 따로 없더라

translation.en: Oh. Speak of the devil.
[man] I'd be happy to die in Corsica, as a matter of fact.
translation.ko: 참고로 코르시카 정도면 난 거기서 죽어도 좋아

translation.en: [Lucy] I nearly did die in Corsica.
I didn't know about this thing called anaphylactic shock.
Yes, it was before I knew about my shellfish allergy.
translation.ko: 그땐 나한테 갑각류 알레르기가 있는지도 몰랐어

translation.en: Three bites of shrimp. My face…
[whispers] Sorry. I have to go.
…it blew up like a balloon. It was absolutely… It was just enormous.
-My throat closed off, I got sick… -Sophie?
What's going on?
James can't make it. There's been some sort of emergency,
translation.ko: 제임스는 못 온대 비상 상황이 발생했대

translation.en: which usually means a debate about noise pollution, but…
translation.ko: 보통은 소음 공해에 대한 토론 정도긴 한데…

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Absolutely. Yes.
-Well, then you should stay. -[Sophie] I can't. I heard from Krystyna.
translation.ko: - 그럼 넌 그냥 있어 - 안 돼, 크리스티나가 연락했는데

translation.en: She's not feeling well, so I have to take over with the kids.
translation.ko: 몸이 안 좋대, 내가 애들 봐야 해

translation.en: This was so lovely. Thank you.
That was rather embarrassing.
I invented three separate excuses in less than 30 seconds on your behalf.
James?
You owe me.
I've fucked up, big time.
Does she have a last name?
Lytton.
Olivia Lytton.
You've probably met her. She's one of my aides.
translation.ko: 만난 적 있을 거야 보좌진 중 한 명이거든

translation.en: -Administrative? -Parliamentary researcher.
So she's new?
Relatively.
And young?
It had been going on for about five months.
I broke it off two weeks ago, right after the party conference.
translation.ko: 2주 전 정당 대회 이후에 내가 그만하자고 했고

translation.en: It meant nothing.
I was flattered.
It was just sex.
Not that there's ever been anything wrong with that part of us. You know that.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 당신과의 성관계에 문제가 있던 건 아니야, 알잖아

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Soph.
There's more.
You're not telling me just to tell me
translation.ko: 잘못한 거 고백하려고 말한 거 아니잖아

translation.en: to unburden yourself.
There's more.
-Is she pregnant? -No. God, no.
The story is about to break.
-When? -Tonight.
The Mail is splashing it tomorrow. Online, late tonight.
translation.ko: 내일 자 메일 신문에 날 거야 온라인엔 오늘 밤에 뜰 거고

translation.en: Chris Clarke's on his way over.
He's coming here? Now? We have to get ahead of this.
translation.ko: - 여기에 온다고? 지금? - 선제적으로 대응해야 해

translation.en: We have to figure out how to protect our children from it.
translation.ko: 애들을 어떻게 보호할지 그걸 먼저 생각해야지

translation.en: We have to do both.
[woman] Can't believe I haven't started my Christmas shopping yet.
[man] Well, you can buy me a drink and save on gift wrap.
translation.ko: 전 술 한잔이면 돼요 포장지도 아낄 수 있고요

translation.en: [man 2] Hello!
Called to see if you fancied a drink.
-It sounds like you did. -Join us.
I'm not in the mood for a crowd.
translation.ko: 사람 많은 데 갈 기분 아니야

translation.en: [man 2] Well, you should be. I heard about the Butler result.
translation.ko: 도대체 왜? 버틀러 사건도 잘 풀렸다던데?

translation.en: -The truth won today. -[door closes]
No, no, no. Kate Woodcroft won today.
Not many lawyers could've pulled that one off.
translation.ko: 그 사건에서 승소할 변호사가 몇이나 될 거 같아?

translation.en: [man 2] It's the Christmas season. Come and join us.
I hate Christmas.
I would have had you over tonight, but Felicity decided to stay in town.
translation.ko: 집으로 오라고 하고 싶은데 펠리시티가 아직 안 떠났어

translation.en: Oh, how unfelicitous.
[man 2] See you soon?
[Kate] Of course.
Have fun.
[Chris] "Top Tory cheats with aide," that's the headline.
I mean, it's not brilliant, but could be worse.
translation.ko: 우리한테 좋진 않지만 이만한 게 다행이랄까요

translation.en: God knows these knobheads are capable.
"PM's friend in trysts in the corridors of power." Don't like that.
translation.ko: '총리의 친구, 정부 고위직에 앉아 밀회를 즐기다', 맘에 안 드네요

translation.en: Oh for fuck's sake.
"Britain's most fanciable MP
had sex with his female aide in a lift in the Commons."
translation.ko: '하원 의사당 엘리베이터에서 여성 보좌관과 섹스를 즐기다'

translation.en: Uh, "James Whitehouse, a Home Office minister and confidant of the prime minister,
uh, conducted his affair with his parliamentary researcher
in the Palace of Westminster.
The married father of two also shared a room
translation.ko: '슬하에 두 자녀를 둔 유부남은 정당 대회 내내'

translation.en: with stunning Olivia Lytton, 28, during the party conference."
[chuckles] Well, that was fucking stupid. Literally.
[Chris] So she's a classic woman scorned. Is that it? I can't speak for her.
translation.ko: - 이 여자 차여서 이러는 거예요? - 그건 나도 몰라요

translation.en: [Chris] But did you speak to her leading up to this?
translation.ko: 일이 이렇게 되기 전에 대화를 하긴 했어요?

translation.en: -Did you know this was coming? -[James] No.
[Chris] "He used her"…
[Chris] Basically, your priority from now on is to rebuild trust all around.
translation.ko: 이제부턴 신뢰를 재건하는 걸 우선으로 생각해요

translation.en: [James] The party conference is not funded by taxpayers.
[Chris] Think anyone's making distinctions?
translation.ko: 하지만 누가 알아나 줄 거 같아요?

translation.en: Johnny Public bankrolls your salary as a minister in Her Majesty's government.
translation.ko: 당신은 장관으로 일하면서 정부 월급을 받는 거예요

translation.en: No one's paying you to bang the help in a House of Commons lift.
translation.ko: 엘리베이터에서 부하랑 섹스하라고 준 돈이 아니라고요

translation.en: -[James] She has a brilliant mind. -[Chris] That'd make a better headline.
"Minister bangs brainy bombshell."
-Alliterative and to the point. -[James] Christ almighty, Chris.
[James] I don't give a fuck about Johnny Public.
[Chris] Johnny Public's gonna be reading this in the Daily Mail.
translation.ko: 다들 데일리 메일에서 기사를 읽을 텐데요?

translation.en: Do you want to have a little chat about it?
[James] Johnny Public will support me. I'm sure of it.
translation.ko: 사람들이 등을 돌리진 않을 거예요 확신해요

translation.en: I expect she'll be dubbed "the ravishing researcher."
You're not gonna be springing any surprises on us?
Such as?
Well, announcing that you're leaving. Putting on your side of the story.
translation.ko: 이혼을 발표한다든가 본인의 입장을 내는 거요

translation.en: Do you need to ask?
-Of course I do. -Of course she's not leaving.
translation.ko: - 이것도 제 일이에요 - 소피가 떠날 리가 없잖아요

translation.en: -Sorry. I didn't mean to-- -[Sophie] Of course I'm not leaving.
translation.ko: - 미안, 그런 뜻이 아니라… - 떠날 리가 없긴 하지

translation.en: We've been married for 12 years. We share two children.
Why would I throw all that away over a stupid mistake?
translation.ko: 멍청하게 실수 한 번 했다고 그걸 다 저버릴 수는 없지

translation.en: And there's no need to offer my resignation?
The PM will make it clear if he wants that, but he doesn't abandon his old friends,
translation.ko: 총리님이 그런 말씀 안 하셨어요 오랜 친구를 내치진 않으실 거예요

translation.en: especially not his closest, and you're one of those.
translation.ko: 최측근은 특히 더요 최측근이니 얼마나 다행이에요

translation.en: Says so right here.
Besides, sex doesn't have to kill a career these days.
translation.ko: 요즘엔 섹스 스캔들 때문에 정치 인생이 죽진 않아요

translation.en: You might even gain some fans amongst the older male voter.
translation.ko: 오히려 나이 든 남성들은 장관님을 더 지지할지도 몰라요

translation.en: [chuckles] I mean, they're hardly gonna argue with some touchy-feely,
translation.ko: 스킨십 좀 한 게 뭐 대수냐 암말이 예쁘면 즐길 수도 있지

translation.en: some fun on the side with a filly.
She's a woman, not a horse.
I'm trying to help your husband.
And you, for that matter.
Well, try not to reveal too much of yourself in the process.
translation.ko: 그동안 속 얘기는 되도록 꺼내지 않으면 좋겠네요

translation.en: Someone's coming out punching. That is very good.
That is exactly what we need right now.
Uh, so listen. No details, but also no denials.
translation.ko: 세세한 내용은 절대 밝히지 마요 부정해서도 안 돼요

translation.en: Denials have a way of coming back to bite you on the arse.
translation.ko: 부정했다가 오히려 더 곤란해지는 경우가 있어요

translation.en: Therefore, do not elaborate.
The sum of your script is this, deep regret, brief affair,
translation.ko: 입장문에는 후회한다는 것과 밀회 기간이 짧았다는 거

translation.en: prioritise your family and constituents,
deflect and dismiss, but never deny. Got it?
translation.ko: 비난을 피하고 종지부를 찍어요 하지만 부정은 안 돼요, 알았죠?

translation.en: -Who's there? -[girl] Me.
[James] Em?
-Were you sitting on the stairs? -How long?
-Not long. -[James] You should be asleep, darling.
I heard voices.
-Hello, Emily. -Remember Mr Clarke?
[Sophie] Let's get you back to bed. Come on.
[smacks lips] What's that Paul Newman quote?
"Why go out for hamburgers when you've got steak at home?"
translation.ko: '집에 스테이크가 있는데 왜 햄버거를 먹으러 가냐고요'

translation.en: Listen to me, you little prick. This isn't a fucking joke, it's my life.
translation.ko: 개자식아, 이게 장난으로 보여? 내 인생이 걸린 일이야

translation.en: I love her. Got it?
Oh, mate. I'm only here because the PM told me to be.
translation.ko: 왜 이래, 친구 난 총리님이 부탁하셔서 온 건데

translation.en: Quite. So do your fucking job, mate,
translation.ko: 알았으니까 일이나 똑바로 해 이 친구야

translation.en: and help me fix it.
Is it over?
[whispers] Yes.
Yes.
Five months?
It was, as you said, a stupid mistake.
[Sophie] At the party conference?
Where else?
Work mostly. Usually late at night.
translation.ko: 주로 사무실에서 그랬어 보통은 늦은 밤에

translation.en: What, on desks?
In the broom cupboard?
On the right honourable leather sofa?
Did the whole office know?
[James] We were careful.
Apparently not.
Hotel rooms?
[James] A few times.
-[Sophie] How many? -Well, I didn't count.
I would like to have a number in mind.
-I would find that helpful. -I don't know. 20, 30.
translation.ko: - 도움이 될 거 같아 - 몰라, 20, 30번 정도

translation.en: She doesn't mean anything to me. It was just sex.
translation.ko: 걔는 정말 아무것도 아니야 그냥 섹스만 한 거야

translation.en: -Nothing's just sex. -But it was, Soph.
It was.
I've been so stressed out at work these past many months.
I'm honoured to have the immigration portfolio,
translation.ko: 이민국 일을 다루게 돼서 영광이긴 하지만

translation.en: but it is impossibly complex and literally life and death.
translation.ko: 업무가 너무 복잡해 생사가 달린 일이기도 하고

translation.en: I haven't even told you a fraction of it.
She… she was just there.
translation.ko: 그런 상황에서 걔가 옆에 있었던 것뿐이야

translation.en: I was weak.
For the life of me, it's a mystery how it even start--
That's enough.
I'm going to bed.
-Oh my God. I'm sorry. -[Olivia] Sorry, James.
-Minister. -Olivia.
Can I get you a cab?
Yes.
Or you could get me another drink.
[James] I'll keep this simple.
Before you stands a man who made a mistake.
translation.ko: 실수를 저지른 한 남자가 여러분 앞에 서 있습니다

translation.en: [James] My brief affair with a colleague
translation.ko: 저는 잠깐 동안이지만 동료와 불륜을 저질러

translation.en: showed disrespect to my marriage,
to my family, and to the trust of my constituents.
As I sometimes say to my children,
under vastly less serious circumstances,
translation.ko: 물론 덜 심각한 상황에서 쓰는 말이긴 하지만요

translation.en: "not okay."
Forgiveness and understanding must be earned,
translation.ko: 용서와 이해는 노력해야만 구할 수 있는 것이기에

translation.en: so I don't presume to ask for those yet, but I do ask for patience
translation.ko: 아직 이를 바라지는 않겠습니다 다만 인내심을 갖고 기다려 주세요

translation.en: as I try to repair the damage done to my beloved family
and my esteemed constituents.
translation.ko: 실망을 안겨드린 만큼 꼭 실수를 바로잡겠습니다

translation.en: Thank you all.
That's all for today!
-Hello there. -[Sophie] Hi, Ellie.
[Ellie] Hi. It's nice to see you.
It's nice that it's not last week. [chuckles]
Apologies for bailing on Mark's birthday. Oh, don't give it another thought.
translation.ko: - 마크 생일에 가 버려서 미안 - 신경 쓰지 마

translation.en: We'll be fine.
Of course you will.
Sometimes, I think sex is the root of all evil. [scoffs]
translation.ko: 가끔은 섹스가 모든 문제의 근원인 거 같아

translation.en: That's rubbish. Sex is great.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 섹스가 얼마나 좋은데

translation.en: At least, our sex is great. It's never been a problem for us.
translation.ko: 우리 섹스는 좋거든 한 번도 안 좋았던 적이 없어

translation.en: [inhales deeply] You're lucky.
And a very forgiving person.
Not really.
Like the man said, he made a mistake.
translation.ko: 그이 말대로 실수 한 번 한 거잖아

translation.en: A fling is just that.
[children] Bye!
You're right.
If mere infidelity were enough to ruin a marriage,
translation.ko: 불륜 한 번에 결혼이 깨질 거 같으면

translation.en: there wouldn't be an intact family in this whole bloody school.
It's an eyeball. She can see that.
-Bye. -[Emily] Can't wait to show Daddy.
-[woman] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-[man] Prime Minister. -Afternoon.
-Prime Minister. -[man 2] I believe he's in?
[man] Yes, indeed. I'll--
-[man 2] James. -Tom.
Can we get you anything?
Does anyone have chocolate?
Chocolate?
Anything sweet. Just a nibble.
translation.ko: 달달하면 다 좋아요 조금만 있으면 돼요

translation.en: We've got Percy Pigs.
Oh cheers.
Still eating sweets, Mr Creosote?
translation.ko: 아직 단 거 못 끊었네, 먹보 씨?

translation.en: [in French accent] Just a wafer-thin mint.
Thank you.
[James] Thank you for not hanging me out.
Yet.
-Well, this is the worst of it? -Yes.
translation.ko: - 나올 얘기는 다 나온 거지? - 응

translation.en: I wish she hadn't been on your payroll.
I wish I had a time machine.
-[Tom] How's Sophie? -Pretty great.
Oh, she's always been that.
Forgiving.
I guess she's always been that too.
No.
This was the first time in 12 years of marriage, I swear on my life.
translation.ko: 12년간 한 번도 없었어 맹세코 이번이 처음이야

translation.en: Don't look so serious.
The past is the past as far as I'm concerned.
-Prime Minister, your diary-- -I know. Thank you.
I was planning to introduce the amendment to the immigration bill.
-With your blessing. -Yes. Amend away.
Now listen. Be good to that wife of yours.
You might think the public are looking to me,
translation.ko: 사람들이 내 반응을 지켜본다고 생각할지 모르지만

translation.en: but they'll be looking to her.
-Mummy, what's a Libertine? -Beg your pardon?
It says here Daddy was a Libertine.
-[Sophie] What are you doing with that? -It was in the study.
I told you to stay out of the study. Don't be a snoop.
-Sorry. What would you like for dinner? -Pizza?
Pizza?
[Sophie] Good idea. Let's do it.
-But, Mummy, what is a Libertine? -[Sophie] Mmhmm?
Um, it was a club that Daddy was in at Oxford with Uncle Tom.
translation.ko: 아빠가 옥스퍼드 대학 때 톰 삼촌이랑 같이 한 클럽이야

translation.en: But what does the word mean?
It means someone who likes to have a good time.
translation.ko: 즐겁게 노는 걸 좋아하는 사람이라는 뜻이야

translation.en: Would you like a pepperoni or plain cheese?
translation.ko: 페퍼로니랑 치즈 피자 중 뭐 먹을래?

translation.en: -Plain cheese, please. -[Sophie] Okay. I'll call when it's ready.
Krystyna?
Wasn't she helping you with homework? We finished.
I'm a Libertine.
No. You're not.
Why not?
Ask Daddy about it. Go, go. I'll call you when it's pizza.
translation.ko: 아빠한테 물어봐 가 봐, 피자 다 되면 부를게

translation.en: [Krystyna] Emily?
[man] Let's go! Libertines!
[man 2] Go, Libertines!
[woman] Sophie!
Sophie!
Fuck's sake.
Please tell me that puddle I stepped in was cider and not fresher piss.
translation.ko: 내가 신입생 오줌을 밟은 건가? 제발 술이라고 말해줘

translation.en: More likely to be second or third-year piss.
[woman] To making it through our first week.
translation.ko: 첫 주를 잘 버텨낸 우리를 위하여!

translation.en: [Sophie] To escaping Mom and Dad.
-[woman] Sorry. -Sorry, sorry.
[woman 2] She lives outside of the library!
-Very funny, Alison. -Oh, I didn't think you'd show.
translation.ko: - 재밌네, 앨리슨 - 안 올 줄 알았는데

translation.en: -You told me not to be such a spod. -And are you? A spod?
translation.ko: - 샌님처럼 굴지 말라며 - 그래서 샌님이야, 아니야?

translation.en: -Yes. -Oh, Holly Berry, Sophie Greenaway.
translation.ko: - 샌님 맞아 - 홀리 베리, 소피 그리너웨이야

translation.en: Holly Berry?
I was conceived on Christmas Eve.
-Christ. -Yeah. That was the other possibility.
[boys] Chug! Chug! Chug!
-What are they doing? -They're anal chugging.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 항문 폭포 마시는 중

translation.en: Anal what?
It's a drinking game the rugby boys like to play.
translation.ko: 럭비 선수 애들이 좋아하는 술 게임이야

translation.en: [Alison] Some of the club boys too. I spot a trio of Libertines over there.
translation.ko: 클럽 애들도 좋아해 저쪽에 리버틴 세 명 모여 있더라

translation.en: …and, while I will go to my grave
respecting the opinion of the honourable member from Morewood and Barnsford,
translation.ko: 모어우드, 반스포드 구역 의원님의 의견을 존중하지만

translation.en: I must dispute her objections to this amendment.
translation.ko: 개정안을 반대하시는 데 대해서는 이의를 제기합니다

translation.en: The honourable lady is concerned about fairness.
This proposed change to the immigration bill
represents the most equitable approach to both skilled and low-skilled workers
of any legislation in the past 50 years!
translation.ko: 모든 직종의 종사자들에게 공정하게 접근하고 있습니다

translation.en: -It is more inclusive, not less! -[indistinct clamoring]
translation.ko: 훨씬 더 포용적이란 말이죠 그 반대가 아니라요

translation.en: Esteemed colleagues,
if I have learned anything in my 44 years on this Earth, it is this.
translation.ko: 제가 44년을 살면서 배운 교훈이 하나 있습니다

translation.en: If it looks like a duck, walks like a duck, and quacks like a duck,
translation.ko: 오리처럼 보이고, 오리처럼 걷고 오리처럼 꽥꽥 소리를 낸다면

translation.en: vote aye for that duck.
And what about a duck caught having an affair
translation.ko: 오리가 어린 부하 오리랑 불륜을 저지르다 발각되면

translation.en: with a duckling in his employ?
What does the honourable gentleman think such a duck should do?
translation.ko: 명예로우신 의원님 생각엔 오리가 어떻게 해야 할까요?

translation.en: -[man 2] Yeah. -[man 3] Yes.
Swim.
[woman] Order! Order!
So he acquitted himself well?
Oh, you mean other than having an affair with a subordinate half his age
and fucking her in a Westminster lift before elevenses?
translation.ko: 웨스트민스터 엘리베이터에서 아침부터 섹스한 거 말고요?

translation.en: I mean today, in the House. And she's not half his age.
translation.ko: 오늘 의회에서 잘했냐고요 솔직히 딸뻘은 아니잖아요

translation.en: -Looks it. -Plus, he's popular.
You're the one who told me he's number two on sexymp.co.uk, or whatever it is.
translation.ko: 섹시한 정치인 랭킹 웹사이트에서 2위를 달리고 있다면서요

translation.en: He's moved to number one.
Well, that's surely a first for a member of the Conservative Party.
Besides which, he's the most naturally gifted politician
on our side of the Chamber.
[Chris] Still, if he gets full on MeToo'd,
it could start to make your loyalty look ill-advised.
It would make the public wonder what it's based on, Prime Minister.
translation.ko: 대중은 총리님과 제임스가 왜 가까운지 궁금해할 거예요

translation.en: History. Nothing more complicated.
James Whitehouse's famous shepherd's pie.
translation.ko: 유명한 제임스 화이트하우스표 셰퍼드 파이 대령이오

translation.en: -Isn't that Granny's recipe? -[James] Only better.
This is version 2.0. We haven't had this in ages.
translation.ko: - 2.0 버전이라고 할 수 있지 - 진짜 오랜만에 먹네요

translation.en: I make it all the time.
Really? Is that why you had Tuppence
walk you through the recipe on three occasions?
I suppose it has been quite a while.
[James] Krystyna.
It's yummy, Daddy.
-Good. -Napkins.
[Krystyna] Mmm. Yes, James. Really good.
[boy] So yummy.
-Would you like some wine? -Please.
-Krystyna, would you some? -No. Thank you.
I'd like to propose a toast.
-[Emily] To what? -To Mummy.
No. Why?
'Cause she's the most wonderful woman I know.
-To Mummy. -[all] To Mummy.
-[Sophie] Sorry. -No.
-[coughs, laughs] -[Olivia] So I read your draft proposal.
I think it's cracking.
[James] Too bad. The hardliners are telling me it's too humane.
What do you think? Can I have some more?
[laughs] Oh God, sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: 어때요? 좀 더 마셔도 돼요? 이런, 미안해요

translation.en: -[James laughing] -Oh, now it's empty.
[James] Well, that explains how you managed to take advantage of me.
[Olivia] Oh yes. Sorry about that.
[woman] Where are you?
[Kate] At the office.
[woman] At this hour on a Friday?
That's bonkers. Come round for a drink.
translation.ko: 그건 아니지, 이리 와서 술 한잔해

translation.en: I'd love to, but I got pulled into something.
translation.ko: 그러고 싶지만 처리해야 할 일이 있어

translation.en: [woman] Oh, it's the holiday season.
For fuck's sake, live a little, Woodcroft.
I'm already sipping a Scotch, you'll be happy to hear.
translation.ko: 스카치 마시고 있는데 그럼 좀 낫나?

translation.en: [woman] Good.
Well, you can chase it with some fizz.
translation.ko: 탄산 좀 있는 거랑 섞어 마셔도 좋잖아

translation.en: A kid in my class's parents knew just what I asked Father Christmas for.
translation.ko: 애랑 같은 반 친구네 부모가 딱 좋은 크리스마스 선물을 줬거든

translation.en: -[Kate] Where are Ed and your kids? -He took them to a movie.
So I've, more or less, one more hour of peace, quiet, and laundry.
translation.ko: 덕분에 앞으로 한 시간 더 평화 속에 빨래를 할 수 있지

translation.en: Come on. Please?
We can get pleasantly pissed while you watch me fold.
translation.ko: 내가 빨래 개는 거 보면서 취하면 얼마나 좋아

translation.en: Look, I'll just be distracted until I finish with these papers.
translation.ko: 서류 다 못 끝내면 어차피 다른 데 집중 못 해

translation.en: What is it?
The usual… [sighs] …but quite high-profile.
translation.ko: 흔히 있는 일인데 유명한 사람들 사건이야

translation.en: I'm not sure I should take this one. Of course you should.
translation.ko: - 이걸 맡아도 될지 모르겠어 - 당연히 맡아야지

translation.en: Look, I really shouldn't discuss it.
Oh don't be ridiculous. You can certainly tell me.
translation.ko: 깐깐하게 굴지 마 나한테는 얘기해도 되잖아

translation.en: Love you.
[Sophie] Thanks, Kenneth. See you in a bit.
Yes.
[woman whispering] Is that Mrs Whitehouse?
Isn't that James Whitehouse's wife?
-Sophie. -Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Can you give us a comment about your husband's affair?
translation.ko: 남편의 외도에 대해 한 말씀만 부탁드립니다

translation.en: Mrs Whitehouse.
[man] Sophie!
[Olivia] James.
-Hi, it's Whitehouse. -[whispers] Hi.
-Can I take your coat? -Thanks.
-Really? -[James] I know.
Hello.
-Hello. -Hello, darling.
-You remember Lawrence Hughes-Davies? -Of course.
translation.ko: - 로런스 휴스데이비스 기억하지? - 당연한 걸 물어요

translation.en: -[Sophie] How are you? -Very good.
-[Sophie] Good. Yeah. -Listen, I was just saying to James.
I've witnessed every kind of weather
in the three and a half decades I've been here.
This doesn't qualify as a squall. Not even a disturbance.
translation.ko: 이번 사건은 돌풍은커녕 난기류 측에도 못 껴요

translation.en: Just a bit of rain, dear.
And look… [chuckles] …it's passed.
Now, boys will be boys,
but I'm sure this one has learned his lesson.
translation.ko: 제임스도 이번에 제대로 깨달음을 얻었을 거예요

translation.en: My wife always said, "Once, okay. Twice, go away."
translation.ko: 우리 아내가 늘 하는 말이 있어요 '처음은 봐줘도 두 번째엔 끝이다'

translation.en: I left it at once.
Enjoy your tea. Hmm?
I'm sorry about that. [chuckles]
You know, I thought I was, um, fine coming here,
but it's bringing it all back.
The affair?
No.
No. My fear.
[James] About what?
I thought we were clear all those years ago.
I am not my mother.
I will not live my mother's life.
I will not be the long-suffering spouse.
translation.ko: 남편이 끝없이 바람을 피워도 참는 아내가 되지는 않을 거라고

translation.en: "Once, okay. Twice, go away." Fuck off.
translation.ko: 처음은 봐줘도 두 번째엔 끝? 꺼지라 그래

translation.en: I'm not interested.
And I can't do it, James.
Especially in the fishbowl of politics.
translation.ko: 모두가 서로를 들춰 보는 정치판에서는 더더욱

translation.en: I always thought that our marriage was, um…
…superior. [scoffs]
Immune.
Was that the lift?
[James] What do you mean?
The one that I just came up in.
translation.ko: 방금 내가 타고 올라온 엘리베이터 말이야

translation.en: Was that one of the sites of your affair?
The one that made the headlines?
Jesus.
[James] I'm so sorry.
I should have found another…
It was thoughtless.
Soph, as awful as this week has been, and everything I put you through,
translation.ko: 소피, 이번 주 힘들었던 거 알아 이런 일 겪게 해서 미안해

translation.en: I am grateful for one thing.
The certainty that you are the person I want to die with.
translation.ko: 죽을 때까지 당신밖에 없단 걸 확실히 깨달았다는 거야

translation.en: Would die for.
Making this right with you is all I care about.
translation.ko: 당신과의 관계 회복 외에 다른 건 중요하지 않아

translation.en: [James] You and the kids.
If you tell me to…
I will give up all this.
I swear.
I will stand up right now and tell this room full of MPs that I resign.
translation.ko: 일어나서 여기 있는 의원들에게 사임한다고 말할게

translation.en: Right now.
If that's what you want.
If the future doesn't include you, Sophie Whitehouse,
the future is shite.
[James] You sure you don't want Kenneth to take you back?
You'll get home earlier this way.
Come on, James!
[Sophie] Come on, James!
Bloody hell, they're fast.
They're unstoppable.
If only he were a bit dim, it might seem fair.
translation.ko: 머리나 좀 나쁘면 그나마 공평하다고 생각할 텐데

translation.en: But no, your boyfriend got dealt all the best cards,
including a spot as an Oxford Blue.
Adonis.
[Sophie] What?
It comes from the Canaanite word for "lord."
translation.ko: 왕을 뜻하는 가나안 단어에서 유래된 말이야

translation.en: He's the god of beauty and desire.
Holly, James Whitehouse is taken.
translation.ko: 홀리, 제임스 화이트하우스 여친 있는 거 알잖아

translation.en: I'm going to marry that boy one day.
You gonna tell him you're gonna marry him?
He knows.
He just doesn't know that he knows. [chuckles]
Yes, mate.
[man] Oh, James. Nice to see Sophie here.
translation.ko: 제임스, 소피가 온 걸 보니 좋네요

translation.en: [James] Thank you.
-Mr Whitehouse. -[James] Yes?
Detective Sergeant Willis.
This is my colleague, Detective Constable Rydon.
We've been trying to contact you.
But your office seemed to have lost track of you.
translation.ko: 집무실에서도 어디 계신지 모르는 거 같더라고요

translation.en: Well, I switched my mobile off while I had tea with my wife.
translation.ko: 아내랑 차 한잔하는 동안 잠시 휴대폰을 꺼 놨어요

translation.en: Criminal behaviour, I know. [chuckles]
-May I ask what this is about? -Olivia Lytton.
What about her?
We'd like to ask you a few questions in connection with an allegation.
translation.ko: 혐의와 관련해서 몇 가지 질문을 드리고자 합니다

translation.en: An allegation of what? Rape, sir.
An allegation of rape.
♪ How the mighty fall ♪
